lead_paragraph: Hooker Ross Ford will become the third player to reach 100 caps for Scotland when he spearheads a new-look front row against Australia on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Ford to Become Scotland Centurion v Australia
headline.main: Ford to Become Scotland Centurion v Australia

snippet: Hooker Ross Ford will become the third player to reach 100 caps for Scotland when he spearheads a new-look front row against Australia on Saturday....
